players.name: Alice
memory: Charlie: "I find it unfortunate that we've lost a valuable member of our community so early in the game. Let's all work together to ensure we don't experience any more unexpected departures."
Diana: "Let's focus on gathering information and not jumping to conclusions. We don't know who the mafioso is, so let's keep an open mind."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Alice, Diana voted for Charlie (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format)

players.name: Diana
memory: You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Charlie: "I find it unfortunate that we've lost a valuable member of our community so early in the game. Let's all work together to ensure we don't experience any more unexpected departures."
You: "Let's focus on gathering information and not jumping to conclusions. We don't know who the mafioso is, so let's keep an open mind."
